draw.overall_supervision_plan: The OIC, RSO, and leadership will conduct a safety brief prior to all training. The OIC and RSO are overall responsible for safety. However, safeties and instructors have the responsibility to be actively engaged in activities and Soldier actions so as to mitigate risk at the lowest level possible and ensure overall safety for the training event. Safety Brief and inspections will also ensure all other mentioned risks are properly mitigated. At least one vehicle and medic will be on site in the unlikely event of any serious injuries.unlikely event of any serious injuries.
